preferences.emailNotificationsDescription: Configure how you receive email notifications from the system.
preferences.enableEmailsDescription: Turn on or off all email notifications. When disabled, you will not receive any emails.
preferences.languageDescription: Choose the language for email content.
preferences.notificationTypesDescription: Select which types of notifications you want to receive via email.
preferences.digestSettingsDescription: Receive summary emails instead of individual notifications.
preferences.dailyDigestDescription: Receive a daily summary of all ticket activity.
preferences.weeklyDigestDescription: Receive a weekly summary of all ticket activity.
preferences.enableQuietHoursDescription: Notifications during quiet hours will be queued and sent afterwards.
preferences.savedDescription: Your email notification preferences have been updated.
preferences.errorDescription: Failed to save preferences. Please try again.

thread.noEmailsDescription: This ticket has no associated email conversations.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.successDescription: You have been unsubscribed from these notifications.
unsubscribe.errorDescription: This unsubscribe link is no longer valid.
unsubscribe.resubscribe: To resubscribe, visit your notification preferences.
